attributes.action: Review & investigate EU referendum for illegitimacy on grounds of misinformation
attributes.additional_details: The EU referendum has been one of the most disconcerting, untrustworthy and unprincipled governmental endeavours in UK history. For the advocacy of greater transparency and political justice, an official investigation of party political proceedings in relation to the EU referendum should be carried out to review the legitimacy and ethics of the entire affair.
attributes.background: Call for an official review and investigation of party political proceedings in relation to the EU referendum for illegitimacy on grounds of misinformation from misleading campaigns.
